messages:
Name: Necip Uysal
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: January 24, 1991
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Beşiktaş
Süper Lig clubs played for: Beşiktaş

Necip Uysal is a Beşiktaş midfielder who has appeared in a strong number of their Süper Lig matches in 2020/2021, making 29 appearances overall and accumulating 1,471 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in 16 of these appearances across their 40 fixtures and come on as a substitute on 13 occasions.

The last time that Uysal featured in the league came on May 15 for Beşiktaş against Göztepe; a game that he played 18 minutes in during a 2-1 success. In total, the midfielder has notched one Süper Lig goal this term, and provided two assists. He has been shown four yellow cards.
His opening goal of the campaign came in the 4-3 victory against Fenerbahçe on November 29.
In last season's Süper Lig, Uysal featured in 15 games for Beşiktaş.
